thread.title: Pervert found with 9,000 of the sickest child abuse pictures cop had ever seen
thread.title_full: Pervert found with 9,000 of the sickest child abuse pictures cop had ever seen - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Pervert found with 9,000 of the sickest child abuse pictures cop had ever seen
text:
Pervert found with 9,000 of the sickest child abuse pictures cop had ever seen David Carey, 33, also had 73 images and 91 movies of extreme pornography portraying people having sex with animals Share By Rob Kennedy 23:37, 15 FEB 2017 Updated 23:41, 15 FEB 2017 News David Carey admitted to possessing thousands of indecent images and movies of children (Photo: Chronicle Live) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email A pervert has pleaded guilty to possessing thousands of indecent images and movies of children described by one police officers as 'the worst he had ever seen'.
David Carey admitted a series of charges in relation to 9,000 “extremely offensive” pictures and films discovered on his computer equipment.
As well as possessing the vile library, the 33-year-old confessed to having distributed some of the child abuse images to others.
A court heard the Carey also had 73 images and 91 movies of extreme pornography portraying people having sex with animals, the Chronicle Live reported .
Carey, who lives with his elderly mum, admitted a total of 13 offences covering the period of 2012 to 2016.
Read More Teen girl posts 'revenge porn' snaps of ex on Instagram after "volatile" nine-month relationship ends The 33-year-old also had extreme pornographic material showing people having sex with animals (Photo: Chronicle Live) Prosecutor Emma Dowling told Newcastle Crown Court: “The officer gives a full description of the images, which he says were some of the worst he has seen.”
Judge Stephen Ear added: “They are described as extremely offensive.”
Carey admitted six offences of making indecent photographs of a child, three of possessing indecent images, two of distributing indecent images, possessing prohibited cartoon images of a child and possessing extreme pornography.
Read More Depraved paedophile had images of children being raped, hung upside down and burned with a blow torch His case was adjourned until the week of March 20 for a pre-sentence report and for a psychiatrist to see him.
Carey, of Langdale Close, Longbenton, was ordered to sign the sex offenders register and was further released on unconditional bail.
Robin Patton, defending, said: “The seriousness has been known to him since his arrest.”
A previous hearing at magistrates court heard the charges relate to photos and movies of category A, the most serious, through to category C, the least serious, and were found on a phone, memory stick and laptop.
